recipe.title: Canyon Ranch Bean Salad
ingredients: 1 cup cooked white beans (home-cooked or canned, rinsed and drained)
1 cup cooked garbanzo beans (home-cooked or canned, rinsed and drained)
instructions: In a small bowl, mix vinegar, oil, salt, and pepper. Beat well. In a large bowl, combine remaining ingredients. Add salad dressing and toss lightly. Divide equally among 4 salad bowls.
